attributes.action: Pay back the money he has paid his BROTHER for cleaning services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the revelations concerning the payment of taxpayer's mpney to Mr Brown's brother for "cleaning services" he should repay the money immediately and appologise. At the same time he should promise that any MPs who have claimed money by false pretenses should face the full forcr of the law and serve time in prison if applicable.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
